column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The bakery offers excellent baked goods. However
column2: the line moves a bit slow. With too few registers (two)
column3: it makes the line out the doors needlessly. The decor is contemporary and casual. But with the line being so long
column4: they need to consider adding another register to handle the long lines. Their skilled bakers are 2nd to none in Houston though.
